dataLink.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

availability.description: An overview of the CMIP6 solar forcing dataset (irradiance as well as particle-related parameters) and guidelines for their usage.
availability.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
name: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing
rationale: For scenario experiments sucha as those in the DAMIP, ScenarioMIP and DCPP projects.
keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
